roadmap.description: Enjoy your Bitcoin in the fastlane. Autobahn is the German name for a highway.

roadmap.description: Bitcoin support, faster transactions (sub 10sec), improved privacy.

roadmap.description: In this update, we will provide an insight detailing the next steps on the road to the Mainnet release.

roadmap.description: A new star is born! We are proud to finally introduce TXL.

roadmap.description: We are excited to have signed this investment and to be supporting Tixl as a strategic partner.

roadmap.description: In addition to our own TXL token and ETH, other ERC-20 tokens can be sent on the Autobahn Network.

roadmap.description: The Autobahn Network Mainnet v0.1 needs to be security-audited by an external auditor.

roadmap.description: We are not only working on an exchange using Tixl´s Autobahn Network, but also more exchange listings.

roadmap.description: We´ll offer token bridges so swapping between ecosystems will be possible.
roadmap.title: Bridges

roadmap.description: Our goal is to fully decentralize the Tixl Autobahn Network and make it open-source as soon as possible.
roadmap.title: Decentral & Open Source

roadmap.description: Tixl's Autobahn technology can be utilized for any other DeFi product.
roadmap.title: Extend Tixl Ecosystem
